tool_description: Tracks and analyzes portfolio performance over time, calculating returns, benchmarking, and attribution analysis.

return_period.description: Return calculation period: daily, weekly, monthly

error_messages: Array length mismatch: portfolio_values and timestamps must have the same length.
Invalid timestamp format: Timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 date-time strings.
Insufficient data points: Need at least 2 data points for performance calculations.
Invalid return period: return_period must be one of: daily, weekly, monthly.
Chronological order error: Timestamps must be in chronological order.
usage: Provide historical portfolio_values with corresponding timestamps. Optionally include benchmark_returns and cash_flows for enhanced analysis. Specify return_period for calculation frequency.

total_return.description: Total return over the entire period
